verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You gave light its speed, You are Lord
You said "Let it be" and it was
You made it all, all that we see is Your work
The universe is held by Your powerful Word

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
You are magnificent
The stars, just a sign of Your radiance
The sun, just a glimpse of Your pow'r
Heaven and earth bow down (1st time go to Verse 2)

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Great in humility
Obedient even to Calvary
Praise in the highest, resounds
Crown Him with many crowns!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Reconciled and free, we are Yours
What a mystery, what a cost
You gave it all, Your blood restores and redeems
You are the Lord, Jesus the King of all Kings

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Crown Him with blessing
Crown Him with glory
Crown Him with wisdom and with thanks
Crown Him forever
Crown Him with honour
Crown Him with power and might
